name: Moon Beat (cjabs)
description:
A Github Game Off 2020 Entry

Play your way to the top! Take your MOON shot! Will you be able to keep up with the beat?

A basic beat game that utilizes expert level .chart files. Songs included are from the public domain, currently no way to upload your own songs.

Controls:

1-7 -> Hit Notes (can be adjusted in the menu)

Escape -> Pause

Team:

Ryan (Jowed) - Programming

Chris (cjabs) - Programming

Known Issues:

-Repeatedly pausing before the notes spawn results in a huge desync
